original_text: Also some of the Philistines brought Jehoshaphat presents, and tribute silver; and the Arabians brought him flocks, seven thousand and seven hundred rams, and seven thousand and seven hundred he goats.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들 중에서는 여호사밧에게 예물을 드리며 은으로 조공을 바쳤고 아라비아 사람들도 짐승 떼 곧 숫양 칠천칠백 마리와 숫염소 칠천칠백 마리를 드렸더라

sentences.original_text: Also some of the Philistines brought Jehoshaphat presents
sentences.korean_translation: 또 어떤 블레셋 사람들은 여호사밧에게 선물을 가져왔으며

sentences.original_text: and the Arabians brought him flocks
seven thousand and seven hundred rams
and seven thousand and seven hundred he goats
